title: [FEATURE] [Blazor] Expose GRContext in SKGLView.razor.cs
body:
I'm currently comparing the Xamarin.Forms (macOS) view SKGLView.cs to the Blazor equivalent. One thing i noticed is that on macOS we can directly access the `GRContext` of the view https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/1131738c9b89212ae53e6d33d994a9480d77a3c8/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.Mac/SKGLView.cs#L86

In the Blazor view this is not an option since the field is private
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/1131738c9b89212ae53e6d33d994a9480d77a3c8/source/SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor/SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor/SKGLView.razor.cs#L22

is this intended? On macOS i'm using the GRContext of the view to generate an additional surface for rendering.

Thank you!
